Name: File System - Grant Permissions
Description: Grant read and write permissions to a folder or file

Parameters.Name: Path
Parameters.Label: Path
Parameters.HelpText: The full path to the file or folder

Parameters.Name: ReadPermissionsTo
Parameters.Label: Read Users
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of users to grant read permissions to

Parameters.Name: WritePermissionsTo
Parameters.Label: Write Users
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of users to grant write permissions to
